About Me

My name is Joe Walsh. I am a self trained software developer. I have experience with the programming languages Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript. I have experience with the frameworks and libraries of Django, Django REST framework, and React. I have knowledge with tools such as Git, Visual Studio Code, Vercel. Also I have a Bachelor's degree in Psychology.

My Work

Game Hub

A website to search for video games developed with JavaScript, HTML, and React. Uses a video game API to retrieve information about video games. It is uploaded on vercal

Battleship Game

Play a game of Battleship against the computer! Can drag your ships onto your board and attack your the opponents random fleet

Menu Website

Restaurant website with DOM manipulation using JavaScript. Check out the homepage, menu, and contact tabs.

Calculator

A calculator app where you can add, subtract, multiply, and divide using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.

Tic-Tac-Toe

Play Tic-Tac-Toe against a friend! This project was created with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML

Weather App

A Weather-App created with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The app uses two APIs. The first API a weather API that retrieves the current weather for a city. The second API is a gif API that retrieves a gif for the current weather.

Todo App

A todo app created with JavaScript, CSS, HTML. Todos are created with constructors and are rendered on the page using DOM manipulation.

Library

Library app created with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Books are created in JavaScript with classes. Books are rendered on the page with DOM manipulation. Books can be deleted and read status can toggle between read and not read.

Sign Up Form

Mock sign up form for a ecommerce website created with HTML and CSS. Uses HTML validation and uses CSS to change borders of inputs when user input is valid.

Etch-A-Sketch

Etch-A-Sketch app created with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Can color the cells black and erase cells with DOM manipulation.
